      • Camera

        public Camera(int x,
      int y,
      int width,
      int height,
      int tileSize)
        Create a new Camera
        Parameters:
        x - Starting x position of the camera
        y - Starting y position of the camera
        width - The width of the camera
        height - The height of the Camera
        tileSize - The tilesize to use to get actual width.

          int py,

          int mHeight)
        Center the camera on the given coordinates
        Parameters:

        py - The Y coordinate to center on
